product_overview: TalentNG is a web-based multi-sided talent marketplace connecting talents, employers, and mentors to opportunities, services, and mentorship. The platform supports role-based onboarding, discovery, applications, session booking, and profile/service/portfolio management.
core_goals: Provide a role-based onboarding and profile system for Talents, Employers, and Mentors.
Enable discovery and application flows for opportunities and talent discovery for employers.
Support mentorship booking and session management for mentors and mentees.
Offer portfolio and services management for talents to showcase and monetize skills.
Deliver robust notifications, profile switching, and account settings with secure authentication.

features.name: User Registration
features.description: Allow new users to create an account with email and password, receive validation feedback, and be redirected to login on success.
user_flows: Navigate to /signup -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Fill confirm password input field -> Click Sign Up button to submit -> See success message -> Redirect to /login
Navigate to /signup -> Fill invalid email input field -> Fill password input field -> Fill confirm password input field -> Click Sign Up button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: User Login
features.description: Authenticate users via email and password and redirect them to their role-specific dashboard on success or show errors on failure.
user_flows: Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill password input field -> Click Login button to submit -> Redirect to /dashboard
Navigate to /login -> Fill email input field -> Fill incorrect password input field -> Click Login button to submit -> See error message on invalid credentials

features.name: Role Selection
features.description: During onboarding users select one or more roles (Talent, Employer, Mentor) to determine role-specific setup and access.
user_flows: Navigate to /onboarding -> View available role options -> Click on role card to select -> Click Continue button -> Proceed to role-specific profile setup
Navigate to /onboarding -> View available role options -> Click Continue button without selecting a role -> See validation error indicating a role must be selected

features.name: Talent Profile Setup
features.description: Collect personal and professional information from talents to create a discovery-ready profile including skills and portfolio links.
user_flows: Navigate to /onboarding -> Fill first name and last name -> Fill username -> Select location -> Write bio -> Add skills and tech stack -> Add portfolio link -> Click Continue to save -> See success and profile saved
Navigate to /onboarding -> Fill first name and last name -> Leave required professional fields empty -> Click Continue to save -> See inline validation errors for required fields

features.name: Employer Profile Setup
features.description: Collect company and recruiter details to build an employer profile for posting opportunities and discovering talent.
user_flows: Navigate to /onboarding -> Fill company name -> Select industry -> Fill company username -> Select location -> Write company bio -> Upload company logo -> Click Continue to save -> See success and company profile saved
Navigate to /onboarding -> Fill company name -> Upload invalid logo file type -> Click Continue to save -> See file validation error

features.name: Mentor Profile Setup
features.description: Capture mentor expertise, session settings and pricing so mentors can receive bookings and manage sessions.
user_flows: Navigate to /onboarding -> Select areas of expertise -> Enter years of experience -> Select mentorship style -> Add LinkedIn profile -> Set session duration and pricing -> Click Continue to save -> See success and mentor profile saved
Navigate to /onboarding -> Select areas of expertise -> Leave session pricing empty -> Click Continue to save -> See validation error for missing pricing or duration

features.name: Talent Dashboard
features.description: Show talents a consolidated dashboard with stats, recent applications, upcoming interviews and achievements.
user_flows: Navigate to /dashboard -> See welcome header with name -> View stat cards (earnings, hired count, applications) -> View weekly overview chart -> View recent applications and upcoming interviews
Navigate to /dashboard -> Data fetch fails -> See error message and Retry button -> Click Retry -> Attempt to reload dashboard data

features.name: Browse Opportunities
features.description: Allow authenticated users to search, filter, sort and save job opportunities for later review and application.
user_flows: Navigate to /opportunities -> View list of opportunities -> Search by keywords -> Apply filters by type and status -> Sort by newest -> Click on opportunity card to view details -> See opportunity details on /opportunities/[id]
Navigate to /opportunities -> Enter search query that yields no results -> See empty state message with suggestion to broaden filters

features.name: Apply for Opportunity
features.description: Enable talents to submit proposals and attach portfolio items when applying to an opportunity.
user_flows: Navigate to /opportunities -> Click on opportunity card to view details -> See opportunity details on /opportunities/[id] -> Click Apply button on opportunity -> Write proposal (minimum 10 characters) -> Attach portfolio projects (max 3) -> Click Submit Application -> See success message

Navigate to /opportunities -> Click on opportunity card to view details -> See opportunity details on /opportunities/[id] -> Click Apply button on opportunity -> Write proposal shorter than 10 characters -> Click Submit Application -> See error message indicating proposal is too short

features.name: Post Opportunity
features.description: Allow employers to create and publish new opportunities including job details, budget, and application settings.
user_flows: Navigate to /opportunities/post -> Fill job title -> Select job type -> Select category -> Fill location -> Select employment type -> Select experience level -> Set start date -> Write job description -> Add key responsibilities -> Add requirements -> Set budget -> Add required skills/tools -> Set application cap and closing date -> Click Post to publish -> See success and opportunity becomes active
Navigate to /opportunities/post -> Fill job details -> Leave required fields empty -> Click Post to publish -> See inline validation errors preventing publish

features.name: Manage Applicants
features.description: Provide employers with applicant lists per opportunity and actions to shortlist, reject, or hire candidates.
user_flows: Navigate to /opportunities/[id]/applicants -> View list of applicants -> Filter by status -> Click applicant to view profile -> Click Shortlist candidate -> See applicant status updated to Shortlisted
Navigate to /opportunities/[id]/applicants -> Attempt to access as non-employer -> See access denied message or role restriction notice

features.name: Discover Talent
features.description: Let employers search and filter talent profiles, view talent cards and open full profiles to hire.
user_flows: Navigate to /discover-talent -> Search talents by name, skills, or services -> Filter by category and location -> View talent cards -> Click to view full profile -> See full profile on /discover-talent/[userId] -> Click Hire button
Navigate to /discover-talent -> Enter filters that exclude results -> See empty state with guidance to remove filters

features.name: Book Mentorship Session
features.description: Enable mentees to book time slots with mentors, provide session notes, and confirm bookings.
user_flows: Navigate to /mentorship -> Click mentor card to view brief -> Navigate to /mentorship/[id] -> View mentor profile and session pricing -> Select available time slot -> Add session topic/note -> Click Book Session -> Confirm booking -> See booking confirmation message

Navigate to /mentorship -> Click mentor card to view brief -> Navigate to /mentorship/[id] -> Select time slot that becomes unavailable -> Click Book Session -> See error message indicating slot is no longer available

features.name: Manage Sessions
features.description: Provide mentors tools to view, confirm, reschedule, cancel, and mark sessions complete.
user_flows: Navigate to /sessions -> View all sessions list -> Filter by status Upcoming -> Click pending session -> Click Confirm pending session -> See session status updated to Confirmed
Navigate to /sessions -> Click Reschedule on a session -> Pick new time that conflicts with another session -> Click Confirm reschedule -> See error message about scheduling conflict

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: Allow users to edit their profile details, add/remove skills, upload photos and toggle profile visibility.
user_flows: Navigate to /profile/edit -> Edit personal information fields -> Add/remove skills -> Upload profile photo -> Toggle profile visibility -> Click Save changes -> See success message and updated profile
Navigate to /profile/edit -> Upload profile photo exceeding size limit -> Click Save changes -> See image upload validation error

features.name: Portfolio Management
features.description: Let talents upload, edit and delete portfolio works with images and descriptions.
user_flows: Navigate to /profile -> Click Add New Work -> Enter work title -> Enter description -> Upload images -> Click Save -> See new work appear in WorksGrid
Navigate to /profile -> Click Add New Work -> Upload unsupported file type -> Click Save -> See error message about invalid file type

features.name: Services Management
features.description: Enable talents to create service offerings with pricing, delivery time and features that can be edited or removed.
user_flows: Navigate to /profile -> Click Add Service -> Enter service title -> Enter description -> Set price -> Set delivery time -> Add features -> Upload images -> Click Save -> See service appear in ServicesGrid
Navigate to /profile -> Click Add Service -> Leave price empty -> Click Save -> See validation error for required price

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Present in-app notifications, allow users to view, mark read, and navigate to related pages from notification actions.
user_flows: Navigate to /dashboard -> Click notification bell icon -> View notification list -> Click notification to view details -> Click action button to navigate to related page -> See related page open
Navigate to /dashboard -> Click notification bell icon -> Attempt to mark notification as read but network fails -> See error toast and option to retry

features.name: Profile Switching
features.description: Allow users who hold multiple roles to switch active role and load role-specific navigation and dashboard.
user_flows: Navigate to /dashboard -> Click profile switcher dropdown -> View available roles -> Select different role -> See role-specific dashboard content load for selected role
Navigate to /dashboard -> Click profile switcher dropdown -> Select role that is not fully provisioned -> See error or notice prompting to complete onboarding for that role

features.name: Applications (My Applications)
features.description: Allow talents to view and track the status of their submitted applications and proposals.
user_flows: Navigate to /applications -> View list of my applications -> Click application to view details -> See status and proposal content
Navigate to /applications -> API returns 500 -> See error page with Retry button -> Click Retry to attempt reload

features.name: Availability Management
features.description: Allow mentors to set available days and times, block periods and configure session lead times and durations.
user_flows: Navigate to /availability -> View calendar of availability -> Add available time slot -> Save availability -> See slot appear in availability calendar
Navigate to /availability -> Add overlapping time slots -> Click Save -> See validation error about overlapping availability

features.name: Settings & Support
features.description: Provide account settings, security options and access to the support center for authenticated users.
user_flows: Navigate to /settings -> Update account preferences -> Click Save -> See confirmation toast indicating settings saved
Navigate to /support -> Fill support form -> Submit form -> See success message and ticket reference
Navigate to /settings -> Attempt to save with invalid input -> See inline validation errors preventing save
